abstract: Several Internet companies, including Microsoft and eBay, are working on new ways to keep spammers from infiltrating their sites.
snippet: Several Internet companies, including Microsoft and eBay, are working on new ways to keep spammers from infiltrating their sites.
lead_paragraph: On the Internet, nobody knows you’re a human — until you fill out a captcha.

headline.main: A Dog or a Cat? New Tests to Fool Automated Spammers
headline.print_headline: A Dog or a Cat? New Tests to Fool Automated Spammers
